rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural lighting and an open layout to comply with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Main Living Area
rooms.description: Large open-plan living room and dining area ensuring east-west orientation for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen layout with modern appliances, designed in the northeast section following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious guest room located on the west side to avoid disturbances and maintain privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet designed in the southwest zone for stability.

rooms.name: Wardrobe Room
rooms.description: Dedicated wardrobe space integrated within the bedroom suite area.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet study and library zone in a serene corner of the house to enhance concentration.

openings.description: Primary entrance door positioned on the northern facade for auspicious entry.
Dual car garage access leading directly into the home, ensuring convenience and adherence to local building norms.
Balcony overlooking the garden providing natural light and ventilation.

additional_features.name: Garden
additional_features.description: Expansive garden space with landscaping designed to maintain a balance of greenery and open space as per local planning guidelines.
